name: Gordon Blaze
bio: Passionate Italian chef known for authentic pasta and wood-fired pizzas.

bio: Expert in traditional Bangladeshi dishes with rich spices and flavors.

bio: Loves bold Mexican flavors, tacos, and homemade sauces.

bio: Classically trained French chef specializing in desserts and fine dining.

bio: Sushi master focused on precision, freshness, and balance.

bio: Modern continental chef blending European flavors creatively.

bio: Renowned for paella, tapas, and Mediterranean flavors.
